title: (8150-144) São Brás de Alportel - 17 Bairro João Rosa Beatriz
title_short: (8150-144) São Brás de Alportel - 17 Bairro João Rosa Beatriz
description: Intermarket with two laundromats in the car park 4 euros for 8 kg and 8 euros for 18 kg of washing two euros for 20 minutes of drying

title: (8150) São Brás de Alportel - R. Cinco de Outubro
title_short: (8150) São Brás de Alportel - R. Cinco de Outubro
description: The parking lot is at a roundabout but is still quiet at night. At the end of February we stood here for two days without any problems. It is about 500 m to the restaurants or the village center. There is no service !! Please do not put out chairs and tables - should be a matter of course anyway, as should garbage disposal.

title: (8150-107) São Brás de Alportel - 16 Avenida da Liberdade
title_short: (8150-107) São Brás de Alportel - 16 Avenida da Liberdade
description: Individual showers and very clean public toilets in the heart of the city

title: (8150) São Brás de Alportel - 343 N2
description: Free water point, good flow, nothing indicates that it is drinkable but it smells of chlorine.

name: Live on Wheels
title: (8150-034) Live on Wheels
description: Live on Wheels ASA Motorhome Service Area São Brás de Alportel Next to the N2 Km 723. Supermarket 50m. New location since March 2022. WiFi, barbecue area, every location with electricity. We now have new toilet facilities

title: (8150) São Brás de Alportel - Unnamed Road
title_short: (8150) São Brás de Alportel - Unnamed Road
description: Fonte da Bica. Small fresh water source with a mini picnic area. Water pressure a little low but it works. Water tastes good and seems to come from the mountain. Approach somewhat narrow and steep, last part of the road unpaved, probably difficult when wet. With a length of 8m (!) We got there well.

title: () Sao Bras de Alportel - unamed road
title_short: () Sao Bras de Alportel - unamed road
description: Belvedere "Alto da Arroteia". View of the mountain, the barrocal and the ocean in the distance. There are tables and a bin. The place is clean! There is nevertheless a service building with tags but the view is beautiful! We stayed the night, not a sound. Attention to the access, we went through the entrance to the South West of Sao Bras de Alportel. More accessible for large vehicles. We have a Master l3h2 ....

name: Motorhome ecopark São Brás de Alportel
title: (8150-032) Motorhome ecopark São Brás de Alportel
title_short: (8150-032) Motorhome ecopark São Brás de Alportel
description: MOTORHOME ECOPARK SÃO BRÁS DE ALPORTEL is ideally located in a natural setting, surrounded by holm oaks, cork oaks and carob trees, in the heart of the Algarve between sea and hills. It is a short drive from Faro airport, the towns of Loulé (10 km), Faro (20 km) and Tavira (28 km) and the Ria Formosa nature reserve. We offer a very good WiFi connection. Several restaurants and supermarkets nearby.

title: (8005) Estoi - un
description: Very nice point of view an hour's walk from the motorhome parking lot in estoi. to get there you have to go up to the second small church in estoi turn left you go straight up to a wall of large stones about 1 km 5 you will see there is a track you take it you go up again for 1 km and there you have a beginning of paved road with a house on the left you take the track just before the house on the left and you go up to the top you have arrived

title: (8150) São Brás de Alportel - Unnamed Road
title_short: (8150) São Brás de Alportel - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful place in between korktrees and eucalyptus. Take the dirtroad in the right of the road close to the bar/ restaurant. You can drive all the way to the end or stay alongside the road next to the stream. Some locals come along to walk their dogs or for mountainbiking. No services but a trash bin.

title: () São Brás de Alportel -
description: Wonderful place, in the middle of nature, with fountain and barbecues. A Rui restaurant that serves you very well and with tapas and excellent food in the open air and very economical. Completely recommended.

title: (8700) Moncarapacho -
description: Very nice free place in nature next to the Barragem. Dogs can enjoy swimming. Quiet place for 1 or 2 campers.

title: (8150) São Brás de Alportel - 348A N270
description: Gas station offering free water refills. The pressure is very low, so you need a little patience.

title: (8700) Moncarapacho -
description: Simple parking space on fenced area. No electricity and water. Please register in advance (German, English)

title: (8100) Loulé -
description: Several places possible along a track well passable and very little frequented connecting two small hamlets / village. The ideal is to deviate a little from the track. For 4x4s it is easy to deviate even more, even to go to one of the summits of the neighboring hills (Atalaïa, Negro, Bispo, ...) possible bivouac on these hills if not too windy.

title: (8005-411) Estói - 1 Rua do Cemitério
description:
Placed on a former sandy football pitch. Near the cemetery. Center within walking distance. Landmark, the Palacio de Estoi.
Schedules for emptying, namely from 7:00 a.m. to 10:00 a.m. and from 4:00 p.m. to 7:00 p.m., this space is in the small car park opposite the cemetery.

title: (8800-166) Santa Catarina da Fonte do Bispo - Unnamed Road
title_short: (8800-166) Santa Catarina da Fonte do Bispo - Unnamed Road
description: PLEASE READ.....& View pics..                                        Wild camping and small medium size camper van / motor homes. Beautiful natural valley, off grid, access to beautiful ancient water mine, close to village of Santa Catarina, local restaurants serve good local cuisine. Great base for hiking cycling and 4x4 vehicles. 20 minutes away from beaches 30 minutes away from Faro or Tavira. Calm and relaxing in Nature. (Please note this is an On going eco/off grid project, we believe in re-cycle re-use and re-purpose ) so please understand we are not a camp site!!!                                                                                        This is just a field and may not be suitable for really posh motor homes, access is easy, but not suitable in rainy season!!!                                                          Please call Before Arrival......

address.city: Santa Catarina da Fonte do Bispo

title: (8150) - 1-2 N2
description: Located on a gravel road in the middle of the mountains above Alportel. Very quiet place with all-round visibility. Pure nature with 4G reception. Quasi total civilization silence, only the rustling of the Winded and the hum of some insects. I made it this far with my 6m jumper. You can only go further up with 4x4 or 6x6.

title: (8700) Moncarapacho - Unnamed Road
description: Right on top of the Cerro de São Miguel you can drive all the way to the top and enjoy this fantastic view. I stood here for 3 days and worked the downhill trails with my Giant. In addition, you can drive to Fuseta and enjoy sunsets and sunrises and probably the most beautiful view of the Algarve

title: (8100) Loulé -
description: Car park of the Miradouro do Alto do Ameixeira. Quiet place, the road is not very busy

title: (8700) Moncarapacho - EM1312
description: A quite passable track for a small van. The bigger ones can stop at the beginning of the track. This track takes a right while going up towards the antennas of Cerro San Miguel which dominates the plain Breathtaking view on the lagoons calm assured. Place we found by chance while trying to get away from Olhao

title: (8150) - Unnamed Road
description: On a small hill on the 4x4 track "Bispo". The track is signposted from the N396 as a 4x4 track. Forest road in between very steep. Not suitable for vehicles with front-wheel drive. Gorgeous all-round view. No vehicle traffic. Pure loneliness. Space is a bit rough. But that can be well balanced with the usual wedges. No service.

title: (8700) Moncarapacho - EM1312
description: Spot at the edge of a small road with very little traffic, with a superb view and close to a large number of downhill mountain bike trails.

title: (8100) Loulé - Unnamed Road
description: Parking right next to a spring with very good drinking water. Very quiet, mountains, forest

title: (8700) Quelfes - EM516-3
description: Very quiet place outside of town next to solar panels. We stayed here for one night with no problem. No service. Perfect for one or two vans and even for motorhomes

title: () Loulé - 329Z N270
description: Lots of places to land in the middle of nature in a maze of tracks bordering a water tank. Attention the road to get there passed by a village whose streets are relatively narrow.

title: (8700) Olhão - Unnamed Road
description: Location is in the middle of nature several hundred meters from the first houses (through dense vegetation). Magnificent view of the local vegetation and surrounding hills. Little shade. No water.

title: (8100) Querença -
description: Welcome to Quinta do Amoroso. We offer you a parking space in our home for your van or mobile home (up to 6m in length). We are happy to support you with solar power on our pitch. Supply and disposal is also possible with us if you don't have any chemicals in your tank. From here you can make wonderful trips to the mountains for hiking. If you prefer to go to the sea, you can drive to the most beautiful beaches in about 15 minutes. Loulé with its well-known market hall is only 7 km away, Faro about 20 km. We look forward to welcoming you soon. Please contact us via WhatsApp beforehand.

title: (8700) Moncarapacho - IP1
description: It is a gas station with three water and air stations, with lots of parking spaces.

title: (8700) Moncarapacho -
description: We slept peacefully.

title: (8100) Loulé - Unnamed Road
description: At the top of a small hill, beautiful view, surrounded by nature, next to a water point for animals. Asphalt access to light motorhomes from the N396; Other possible access by 4x4 from the other side. Another location is possible in the stone path.

title: (8100) Loulé -
description: Wild, flat, very quiet! more discreet than the viewpoint 200m below, but which can easily be reached on foot

title: (8100) Barranco do Velho - N2
description: Beautiful spot on the lakeside, rpad is okay for vans but wouldn't recomend larger vehicles.

title: (8700-061) Moncarapacho - 345F EM514
description: Waking up between the orange trees in a beautiful quiet location. A lovely hot outdoor shower as an added bonus. During our stay we were kindly received and shown around the huge country by Freek and his team from Outbase. Highly recommended to park your camper and enjoy the beautiful surroundings! If you plan to spend the night here, please send a Whatsapp message first to check availability. Please take into account check-in time between 5:00 PM and 8:00 PM

title: (8700) Olhão - Rua Francisco Guerreiro
description: Parking on the outskirts of the village behind the cemetery.  Quiet place to stay.  Slightly sloping surface.

title: (8100) Quintã - N396
description: Possible night along a track leading to a belvedere (antenna relay). Quite quiet, beautiful walks possible in a beautiful landscape of cork oaks. Light or 4x4 vehicles can go further

title: (8700) Moncarapacho - 25M En 398
description: Outside laundrette

title: (8135) Estádio do Algarve - Estádio do Algarve
title_short: (8135) Estádio do Algarve - Estádio do Algarve
description: Huge parking lot near a small park, on the way a water tap (no indication whether drinking water or not), not far from the big football stadium. quiet and calm night, more people on weekends, we were 2 motorhomes, clean place, would be nice that it remains.

name: Camping Lagoão
title: (8700) Camping Lagoão
description: Rustic campsite, very friendly welcome by the manager who is French. Washing machine and dryer. Free WiFi throughout the campsite. Outdoor service area

title: (8100) Querença - Passeio da Azinhaga
description: Nice hard parking lot in a cute little village. Lots of walks in the area. Possibility to sleep depending on the premises

title: (8700) Moncarapacho - Unnamed Road
description: Large place, with some trees. Possibility of finding food. The first photo shows the entrance, we can't see the wild deposit from the spot. I prefer this place to the one already referenced above, because it avoids a good part of the track which does not help the car too much. Once everything is closed, I hardly hear the expressway that passes next door. vehicle a little or recommend, I passed without worry with a carton, but there are stones to pass. Nothing difficult but it is to be taken into account.

title: (8700-094) Moncarapacho - DP Rua das Olarias
description: Large car park at the edge of the city big enough to be quiet at the furthest point of the street.

title: (8100) Quintã - N124
description: Covered picnic area with adjacent parking space for several vehicles - garbage cans available

title: (8135) - 233 EM520-3
description: Santa Barbara de Nexe next to the Stadium a huge vacant lot with wild trees and shrubs next to it if no match stadium parking no amenities

name: Caravanas Algarve
title: (8700) Caravanas Algarve
description:
Small and friendly campsite. All facilities except washing machine included in the price. In an area of orange groves. 1 km from the nearest shop and the charming town.
Not suitable for campers over 8 m.

title: (8700) Laranjeiro - EM1325
description:
LPG and propane distributor.
He fills up pretty much every type of gas bottles which is a rare service to find. 
Very friendly guy that speaks many languages.
Lunch break from 1-3.
Paring right next to the place.

title: (8135) Almancil - Unnamed Road
description: Concrete stadium car park with a little vegetation: very very quiet with plenty of space. It is empty when there is no event. Shade possible, area with trees. Fairly protected from traffic noise. No service.

title: (8100-532) Loulé - 2 Rua Afonso de Albuquerque
description: There are 2 places for Motorhomes on the parking lot of the Aldi supermarket without any other services.

title: (8100) - N2
description: Pitch in nature with a small pond a few meters away.

title: (8135) Almancil - Avenida do Algarve
description: Parking of the new Ikea store located in the Algarve near Loulé. There is a large shopping center with many shops, cafes and restaurants. Open from 10am. This car park is north, but you have other large car parks all around the mall. No height bar so far. You also have a Leroy Merlin DIY store nearby.

title: (8135) Almancil - Avenida do Algarve
description: Free parking in parking lot of Shopping centre with IKEA and supermarkets. Have stayed multiple times overnight without issue. No signs saying it is not allowed. Free wifi and cheap food at IKEA.

title: (8100) Loulé - Santa Luzia
description: Above Loulé, parking lot of a small chapel overlooking the city, very quiet, in nature, flat land.

title: (8100) Loulé - 42 Rua Manuel Cabeçadas
description: A new parking lot right next to the skate park, 30 car parking spaces, 4 for buses, right next to it is a motorway, a beautiful park with a picnic area, mini golf, sports facilities, sports equipment, soccer field, rugby club café, running track for jogging stood 02.10. 2021

title: () Loulé - Avenida do Algarve
description: Parking between IKEA and Leroy Merlin huge large shopping center I spend the night here it seems good I'm not alone.

title: (8100) Querença - EM524
description: Small parking to visit Fonte Benémola. Only a parking and no facility's. Perfect for a quiet night.

title: (8100-537) Loulé - 17a Rua Lopo E. de Sárria
title_short: (8100-537) Loulé - 17a Rua Lopo E. de Sárria
description: Washing salon. Parking close by.

title: (8100) Loulé - N125-4
description: It's a fountain that is almost hidden, right next to Rotunda do Barrocal. It has a small garden with a dirt road so you can park there without bothering anyone. I don't know if the water is good for consumption, but you cab use it to fill the RV's water tank. There's always locals filling water bottles as well. The garden I think is under construction and it has what looks like something you'll be able to attach a hose on.

title: (8100) Loulé - 33 Avenida 25 de Abril
description: Free place near bus station, park and town.

title: (8005) Faro - 163-A N2
description: Campingaz 904, 907 refill

title: (8700-061) Moncarapacho - Unnamed Road
description: Camping Route 66, old-fashioned but nice US-style campsite, animals such as horses, pigs, sheep, etc. run loose on the campsite. Toilet and new showers (50c) available, internet weak to non-existent in the camper, fine at the office. Dogs are not allowed to run loose because of the many stray animals.

title: (8800) Tavira - Unnamed Road
description:
Tranquil picknick area with place for 3 campers.
Tables, bbq and watertap. Next to the river.
Staying overnight is no problem.
Start of walk PR 13 (13,5 Km)

title: (8100) Querença - Unnamed Road
description: Small dirt road leading to a concrete area with several sheltered water points, bench and trash can. A place in the shade under an oak tree and another on the playground. Quiet, just a resident came to fetch water.

name: Samedi Camping
title: (8700) Samedi Camping
description: This is a private camping, you can also rent vans, huts, containers, it is 5000 sqm, it has mixed bathrooms and a big, external kitchen, it is quiet and not far from Olhao and the first beach, praia dos cavacos, both around a 5 minutes drive. Come pay us a visit at Tugatok!

title: (8005) Faro - N125
description: At Autopatacão there is a washing area without a roof and you can wash your motorhome there yourself. Our mobile home is 3.20 m high and there was still a lot of room above it. The machine accepts coins  and MBWay. open 24 hours.

name: Associacão As Ceghonas
title: (8700) Associacão As Ceghonas
description: Associação As Ceghonas: Portuguese non-profit association. This association offers you a small plot for you and your motorhome, truck, caravan... you will be welcomed in a beautiful orange grove with plenty of space. 10 minutes from the beach.

title: (8005-140) Faro - Estrada da Penha
description: Super point of view above Estoi, it takes 1 hour to go there

title: (8100-665) Loulé - 118 Rua de Nossa Senhora da Piedade
title_short: (8100-665) Loulé - 118 Rua de Nossa Senhora da Piedade
description: A large parking just 300 MTRS from the historic center. Very convenient with shade if you're lucky. It is used for trucks and cars hence the entry is easy.

address.street: 118 Rua de Nossa Senhora da Piedade

title: (8100-705) Loulé - 1 Rua Marçal Aboim
description: Free water at the BP station

title: (8100) Loulé - 96 Avenida Andrade de Sousa
description: Open space by Lidl store, found by chance after a lot of research on Loulé (the other advertised car parks seem too unpleasant) here it is clean and quiet the store opens at 8:30 for a small coffee and we are ten minutes walk from the center village where the market is active every day except Sunday

title: (8100) - N2
description: Next to the restaurant you can just stand for the night.

title: (8100) Loulé -
description: Free parking located on the Lidl square. Free toilets available in the store during opening hours.

title: (8100-724) Loulé - 66 Travessa Amorim Benevides
description: Parking next to the Continente shop

title: (8700-247) Olhão - 20 Avenida dos Bombeiros Municipais de Olhão
title_short: (8700-247) Olhão - 20 Avenida dos Bombeiros Municipais de Olhão
description: Repsol gas station with LPG gas

address.street: 20 Avenida dos Bombeiros Municipais de Olhão

title: (8700) Olhão - 118A N125
description: Lidl in Olhão with special parking area for motorhomes.

title: (8700) Olhão - N125
description: Wide and long parking space only for motorhomes and converted vans, on the Continente supermarket. Clean and practical, with a black and gray water drain terminal and clean water filling in the Lidl car park 300m away.

title: (8700) Olhão - 120A N125
description: Between the Continente and LIDL store on the Nationale 125 coming from Faro and going on Tavira, you will find a high-pressure washing machine for vehicle running coin operated. Antoine, the French speaking owner has installed a rustic area for the evacuation of gray and black water and arrivals and separate water pipes for rinsing cassettes or full of water. In addition, it will inform you about the sector in case of need.

title: (8700-156) Olhão - H2 Rua Fernando Pessoa
description: Free parking 10min walk from the city. It remains a bit inclined and a few vehicles pass in the night, but all in all we spent a quiet night.

title: (8100) - Unnamed Road
description: Small nature corner with small dam for swimming, sleeping at the water's edge the top 2 places for van

title: (8700-395) Olhão - R. da Feira
description: Large parking with a beaten earth, relatively flat. Close to the road but it's ok for sleeping. Next to the municipal swimming pool. Gas station at 100m. A few holes when it rains, but that's more than enough with a campingcar.

title: (8700-395) Olhão - 6 Rua da Feira
description: Shower at the pool. Temperature adjustable

name: Camping Olhão
title: (8700) Camping Olhão
description: Camping et caravaning Do Syndicate Dos Bancários Do Sul E Ilhas Portugal Camping full but very good service. There are possibilities to wash the van / AC. Cafeteria, rest. Very friendly staff and very economical prices!

address.street: Parque de Campismo do Sindicato dos Bancários do Sul e Ilhas

title: (8700-395) Olhão - R. da Feira
description:
Parking flat next to the swimming pool,
no ban, in troubleshooting when the park in town are full

title: (8700) Quelfes - Rua José Bráz Pereira
description: Intermarché petrol station. To fill up with water (not drinkable) take a token at the station.

title: (8005) Faro - 332A N125
description: This is a shop specialized in gas. We had an issue with our Spanish bottle, and they helped us to fix it for free! Highly recommended shop if you need any help with gas.

title: (8100) Loulé - 39A Rua dos Cesteiros
description: A day in Quinta da tor Vineyard and sleep here. It’s blissfully quiet and has an amazing vineyard about a 20 minute walk away if you are driving.  Peace in comparison to overloaded stays. Recommended by the vineyard !

name: Motorhome Service Area Intermarché
title: (8700) Motorhome Service Area Intermarché
description: Parking Intermarché a little away from the parking of cars. Well stabilized and relatively level, the place is an excellent alternative (free) to the always complete private area located a few tens of meters. In front of the supermarket, open every day from 9am to 9pm, a launderette and on the first floor a restaurant. No service but optimal satellite and 4G reception.

title: (8100) Loulé - 8 Estrada do Poço Lavaginho
description: Water station / faucet at the roadside.

title: (8005-427) Faro - 324A N2
description: Easy parking opposite Lidl. Dead end with good turning possibility, also suitable for mobile homes.

title: (8700-376) Olhão - 93 Rua 18 de Junho
description: Luxury laundry. parking inconvenient but / - 800 meters from motorhome. 7 kg 4 euro 12 kg 7.50 euro 16 kg 8.50 dryer 16 kg 1.30 per 15 minutes 8 washing machines 4 dryers. price Mar 2019

title: (8005-334) Faro - 5 Rua Professor Antonio Pinheiro e Rosa
title_short: (8005-334) Faro - 5 Rua Professor Antonio Pinheiro e Rosa
description: Continent supermarket parking spaces reserved for motorhomes, no service.

address.street: 5 Rua Professor Antonio Pinheiro e Rosa

title: (8700-281) Quelfes - 64 Rua da Manageira
description: Hand wash.

title: (8100) Loulé - Rua Padre José António Nobre Duarte
title_short: (8100) Loulé - Rua Padre José António Nobre Duarte
description: Many paved parking spaces, there is this one and the one that is attached to the Sanctuary. Far from the center to walk, by car is a moment. Quiet night, no noise.

address.street: Rua Padre José António Nobre Duarte

title: (8100) Loulé - R. Padre Jose Antonio Nobre Duarte
title_short: (8100) Loulé - R. Padre Jose Antonio Nobre Duarte
description: Parking on several floors below the Sontuario. On the lower level are parking spaces suitable for RVs with a rear overhang. Please do not park in the upper rows, because there are also visitor buses coming. Clean toilets on the south side of the santuario, drinking fountain on the north side. Place very clean. Please keep it that way. City center in 1.9 km distance. Very quiet at night.

address.street: R. Padre Jose Antonio Nobre Duarte

title: (8700) Quelfes - 28 Avenida dos Operários Conserveiros
description: Area to park something withdrawn from the village, but very comfortable when you have big AC. Being between ships and the port I would not stay at night although there is no sign of prohibition.

name: Piscinas Municipais de Faro
title: (8005) Piscinas Municipais de Faro
description: Faro, municipal swimming pool with ample parking for campers and gym (6 machines).  You do have to take your ID in with you as they log each person on the system as a 'member' even if you're only there for one visit, I think for safety reasons. The guy on reception also mentioned something about municipal kayak rental on the beach.

title: (8700) Moncarapacho - Unnamed Road
description: Good spot for fuel and water if you fill your tank :) cheap fuel is also positive! The responsible is a humble guy and helped us with water!

title: (8005) Faro - EM518
description: Laundry outside at Auchan gas pump and LPG also cheaper.

title: (8100) Loulé - 8100 Circular de Loulé
description: Vacant lot, we stayed here for several days without problems because repairs had to be done in the garage next door. Convenient because 2km from Loulé, Cepsa station next door, Lild and other supermarkets nearby.

title: (8700-339) Olhão - 84 Largo da Feira
description: Parking for campers and a beautiful village.

title: (8700-339) Olhão - 61 Largo da Feira
description: Great place to sleep. Walking distance to the covered local fresh market. It is open every morning from Monday to Saturday and is located directly on the harbor.

title: (8000-123) Faro - 1 Estrada de São Luís
description: Ground parking without service

title: (8700-307) Olhão - 13 Avenida 5 de Outubro
description: Several options are possible 11 kg, 14 kg and 18 kg.

title: (8700-339) Olhão - 7 Largo da Feira
description: Parking space where it is allowed to stay overnight in your motorhome out of season.

title: (8005-518) Faro - 29 Rua Manuel Alexandre
description: Washing machine, self service washing machine. Car wash self service.

title: (8100) Loulé - Av. Andrade de Sousa
description: CEPSA station, with LPG and cepsa propane and butane bottles

title: (8700) Olhão - Avenida 5 de Outubro
description: Simple gravel parking on the edge of salt work. nice for birdwatching in the morning!

title: (8005-160) Faro - 8 Rua Major General António José da Costa Pinto
title_short: (8005-160) Faro - 8 Rua Major General António José da Costa Pinto
description: Next to Lidl but not on Lidls private parking. Stayed 1night with 2 other campers. More then 50 spaces.

address.street: 8 Rua Major General António José da Costa Pinto

title: (8700-160) Olhão - 30 Avenida 5 de Outubro
description:
Bottled Gas.
The small shop Jovale in Olhao opposite the marketplace has all types of articles you might need for camping, campingcar - from gas, to water, nipples, jerrycans, stainless steel cups and plates, knives etc. You name it, they have it! Great place.

title: (8700-302) Olhão - 4 Avenida 5 de Outubro
description:
Boutique de pêche en bord de mer où ils vendent des campingaz.

Nous avons avons pu recharger nos bouteilles petite et moyenne taille.
Ce qui est difficile à trouver.

Parking payant (0,30cts/30min)

title: (8000-123) Faro - 199 Rua Reitor Teixeira Guedes
description: Large and shady parking area. Motorhomes up to 7 meters. Ours (7.23m) enters the post.

title: (8005-145) Faro - BP En 125
description: Public parking behind the mall, close to shopping centers, gas stations, supermarkets etc. Amazing view, little busy area

title: (8700) Moncarapacho - M Rua Fundeira
description: Quiet area, a few stray dogs. Nice place for the day. Prohibited at night (like all the Portuguese coast), automatic fine by post

title: (8005-145) Faro - BP En 125
description: Non-drinkable water. The lady kindly let us fill up our tank.

title: (8005-139) Faro - 15 Rua Manuel Gomes Guerreiro
description: Beautiful location in a pine forest near the University of Faro. Shops at 300 m. No services. Very calm night. Some walkers.

title: (8000-424) Faro - 137 Rua Reitor Teixeira Guedes
description: Parking for motorhomes 15 minutes from downtown.

title: (8700) Moncarapacho - 16 Rua Professor Honorato Pisco Ricardo
title_short: (8700) Moncarapacho - 16 Rua Professor Honorato Pisco Ricardo
description: Tree-lined parking lots at the exit of the small village. Quiet area although next to the road.

title: (8005-145) Faro - Rua João Brito Vargas
description: Parking area, close to shopping centers, next to some garden areas

title: (8800-509) Tavira - 403Z N270
description:
With an area of 2 hectares in our service area at Quinta da Eira Antiga, you can enjoy a peaceful night in the middle of the countryside, enjoying the silence and fresh air of nature. Quinta da Eira Antiga motorhome service area is in Sitio do Prego, 6 km from Tavira, 2 km from Santo Estevão, 5 km from Santa Catarina and 1 km from the Via do Infante exit.


The service area for motorhomes is equipped with all the necessary conditions to provide a pleasant stay for those who visit it. Located in an area of about 2 hectares, 8 km from the beach and served by a bus stop outside the Quinta da Eira Antiga to Tavira.

title: (8005) Montenegro - 22 Rua Norton de Matos
description: Self-service laundry - not expensive! Directly at the entrance to the Continente supermarket. Detergent and softener included :-)

title: (8005) Faro - Estudante do Passeio Ribeirinho
description: Day parking behind the theater.

title: (8100) Loulé - Estrada do Poço Lavaginho
description: Parking Tôr stadium, flat land, clay, 2 picnic tables, quiet on weekdays. No service

title: (8100) Loulé -
description: A picnic table on the via algarviana trekking path. there is a small stream nearby but in the early autumn it was still dry.

title: (8700) Moncarapacho - 4 N125-5
description: Self service laundry. Clean. 8 kg, 60 min: 4 euros. 4 machines for 16 kg, 55 min: 8.50 euros. 2 dryers of 16 kg per 15 min: 1.30 euro.

title: (8800-102) Tavira - 332E EM1337
description: Places where we spent a quiet night.

title: (8700) Moncarapacho - 587 Rua de Arte Nova
description: Calm and spacious place to park during the day.

title: (8005) Faro - Unnamed Road
description:
Shady place with a nice view. Some airplane sound especially in the evening and in the morning, but not too disturbing for us. 
Road is a bit sandy, very easy in a 4wd, but we also got there with our 2wd van. Better arriving at daytime when you're in a 2wd.

Go to the nearby tree icon first and then continue. It's less dirty here.

title: () Faro -
description: Sandy course in the middle of a beautiful pine forest. Thanks to the trees very shady and pleasant in the heat. Sandy access road, only with 4x4.

title: () Faro - Avenida Anibal C. Guerreiro
description: Provided by the Lidl store. Useful if nothing else has been found. Has the merit of existing.

name: Faro Campervan Park
title: (8005-177) Faro Campervan Park
description: Area for motorhomes with 30 spaces located 1.5 km from the international airport and 3.5 km from Faro Beach, and the entrance to a spectacular bike path through the Ria Formosa Nature Reserve, a landmark area of the region and just a few meters away from restaurants offering typical food at good prices, supermarkets, bus stops for your visit to Faro city center, highways, and hospitals. We offer toilets, showers, laundry service, individual electric connections, waste collection, video surveillance, wifi, and picnic tables. Open all year round.

title: (8000) Faro - Avenida Anibal C. Guerreiro
description: Parking without asphalt, with some trees with shade. 10 minutes walk from the center of Faro.

title: (8700) Moncarapacho - 122 Rua da ponte pequena
description: A few parking spaces 800m from the beach. Difficult to park with a CC of more than 6m.

title: (8000-470) Faro - 2 Avenida da República
description: Parking by the marina. Close to many restaurants.

title: (8000-151) Faro - 84 Rua Dona Teresa Ramalho Ortigão
title_short: (8000-151) Faro - 84 Rua Dona Teresa Ramalho Ortigão
description: Paid parking in the city center

title: (8000-417) Faro - 2 Praça Alexandre Herculano
description: Laundry with good service

title: (8000-541) Faro -
description: Paid parking space from 8 a.m. to 9 p.m. Free for the night. Restaurant and bar next door. Close to train tracks but only 1 train passed in the evening. A few planes pass. Otherwise quiet

title: (8000) Faro - R. José Maria Brandeiro
description: Drinking water point

name: Park and Trip Faro
title: (8005-207) Park and Trip Faro
description:
We are a car park for cars and motorhomes, close to Faro airport. 
Good location just a few minutes from supermarkets, restaurants, hospital, beach and other leisure areas.

address.street: 15 Rua Dom Antonio Pereira da Silva

title: (8800) - Unnamed Road
description: Parking at the edge of a small country road in the middle of citrus plantations. Calm. Access to the waterfall not very far. No shade. Place for 6-7 vehicles.

title: (8000-250) Faro - 22 Largo da Sé
description:
Parked here on 27/8 to visit Faro, but decided to stay overnight. No signs to be seen that campers are prohibited.
It is a somewhat noisy place, but good for a night's rest.
Difficult to park with a larger camper, free parking on Sundays and public holidays.

name: Camping Municipal de Fuseta
title: (8700-011) Camping Municipal de Fuseta
description: The Fuseta Municipal Camping is a facility with about a hundred pitches, just a few steps from the center of the village. Many RV drivers settle down for several months. Pay attention to the TV reception is sometimes very difficult because of the trees. Wifi is available on the whole site. The pitches are parceled out and gravelled. There are three seat sizes to choose from. Up to 75 sqm, up to 100 sqm and > 100 sqm. However, many are not particularly large, mostly narrow and long. You stand close together. View of the houses on the street in the background. Overall no beauty and no nature camping.

title: (8800) -
description: Parking space between orange groves. Handy when the nearby parking lot is full 100 meters earlier. Quiet, dead end. Walk to waterfall 'Pego do Inferno', about 10 minutes.

title: (8100) Salir - 332Z N124
description: Fountain with good flow.

title: (8700) Moncarapacho -
description: Small land full, sea view, light wind, not bad at all

title: (8700-011) Fuseta - G Rua General Humberto Delgado
title_short: (8700-011) Fuseta - G Rua General Humberto Delgado
description: Parking near the coast - forbidden to sleep in this place. GNR will fine if taking up more than one space and if camping gear is out.

title: (8005) Faro - 9 Praceta Florival Miguel
description: Large parking area in a large residential area. We parked under the trees and had a quiet night.

title: (8800-102) Luz - 764V EM1334
description: Place to park with an area of trees nearby to be able to visit the beach with dogs

title: (8800) Tavira -
description: Cascata do Pego do Inferno. Difficult to access, hidden behind fields of orange trees, at the end of a road “only accessible for agricultural vehicles”. Small water point in the shade, no waterfall in summer but swimming possible. A few fishermen during the day. Very pleasant

title: (8100) Loulé - N2
description: Fresh water tap. Large thread

title: (8800) Tavira - EM514-2
description: Water available. And picnic area The water is really good!

title: (8005-408) Faro - Unnamed Road
description: Parking on the roadside. Little traffic. Great for waiting for a flight but nothing more.

title: (8800) Palheirinhos - Unnamed Road
description: In the heart of nature on a small dirt road. Superb view of the surrounding hills.

title: (8800) Santo Estevão -
description: Nice spot to stay overnight with o wonderful view, few cars passing by and almost none during the night!!

title: (8800) - N397
description: Small but enough pavement on this hilly road, perfect for a night stay! On right of it a small pavement road to a place between hills, completely out of sight! No services!

title: (8800) Tavira - 3 N270
description: This is a small parking area. I spent a real quit night here from Sturday to Sunday on September.

title: (8125-018) Quarteira - 156 Acesso Particular
description: Perfect place to eat and rest. No problems sleeping and with plenty of shade among the pines. Without services although with a nearby area to load water. Right next to the water park, with several entrances to the pine forest. Perfect for a day.

title: (8100) Loulé - 302A N125
description: It is a Repsol gas station. In it we could fill the water tank, a thread of water comes out of the hose ... but patiently. And besides, we were able to use the public toilets.

title: (8100-202) Salir - N124
description: Two water taps with good flow next to the playpen. Sign with marked "uncontrolled water", but a lady from the village was filling a dozen large plastic bottles and assured us that there was no problem to drink it. We trusted him.

title: (8100) - N2
description: Viewpoint "Miradouro de Caldeirão" with picnic areas. Fairly windy, at night possibly traffic noise, as it was located directly on the N2. But the perfect resting place with panoramic views over the Serra de Caldeirão.

title: (8125-018) Quarteira - 35 Beco Duas Sentinelas
description: Parking area, for the time to be at AquaShow. In the end there was no one and a shady pine tree.

title: (8135) - 7 Rua das Palmeiras
description: Quinta do Lago can not be said to be very hospitable to motorhomes, with its luxury villas and sidewalks with towering flower beds. The beach parking is inaccessible, fully covered to shade luxury vehicles, not enough height. We found this parking, in front of a private beach. It allows an easy departure along the lake for the big beach via the long footbridge or for the walk or bike ride in the lagoon of Ria Formosa, indicated on the panels.

title: (8800) Colos -
description: Small but straight pitch with lots of cairns. Good for one night.

title: (8800) - 750Z N397
description: Roadside area where the traffic is low. Spent 2 more than peaceful nights with a splendid view in the morning. Possibility of wind.

title: (8005-520) Faro - Nº2 Avenida Nascente
description: Public toilets either side of the car park at the end of Ponte Praia de Faro. Free and relatively clean although no toilet paper in them. The car park is prohibited over night but useful stop for toilets by the beach. Open 0800 - 1800

title: (8005-520) Faro - 14 Avenida Nascente
description: Parking next to the beach, at noon there is usually a bustle.

name: Parque Campismo Praia Faro
title: (8005) Parque Campismo Praia Faro
description: It is a municipal campsite located right in Praia de Faro, overlooking the Ria Formosa. It comes from the municipality of Faro, has large toilets and showers, many pitches for the tent but only one car park with 23 pitches for motorhomes. Rates vary according to season and size of the motorhome. Attention, the access bridge to the Praia de Faro is prohibited for people over 3.5 t!

title: (8800-562) Santa Luzia - 2A EM1347
description: Parking near praia do barrel. Given how difficult it is to park in high season, this is the best option. Very close to the beach, many cars around and a safe place. We did not stay overnight but there is no prohibition in this place.

title: (8800) Colos -
description: Small recess on the track, sheltered from the wind. We spent a peaceful night with the ocean in the distance

title: (8135-162) - Avenida do Ancão
description: Great beach, not overcrowded. Day parking

title: (8125) Quarteira - Av. do Ancao
description: Parking lot. No ban on mobile homes.  Prohibited for vehicles over 3.5t Not suitable for vehicles over 6m.

title: (8800-562) Santa Luzia - 300 EM1347
description: You cannot camp, but you can park during the day. NO overnight stay! No service. A very quiet place where you can take a train that will take you to the Anchor Cemetery. On the beach there are restaurants and toilets.

title: (8135-170) Almancil - 70 Avenida Oceano
description: Beach parking with restaurants.  No services. Please respect nature.

name: Parque de Autocaravanas Quarteira
title: (8125) Parque de Autocaravanas Quarteira
description: Closed Tuesdays from 3:00 pm to Wednesdays 7:00 pm. Payment terminal and barrier at the entrance, closed and guarded.

title: (8100) Cerro de Alganduro -
description: Super quiet place in autonomy

title: (8125-303) Quarteira - 321D Urbanização Vila Sol
description: Stoped at the restaurant Oscars Bar & Kitchen and the free Car park off to the side, in front of real estate is spacious and calm in the night. No services but recommended

title: (8800) Tavira - Unnamed Road
description: At the top of a hill, the ocean on the horizon, no house nearby, no passage, super quiet to spend the night. Slightly rocky path to get there but accessible to all vehicles.

title: (8800-562) Santa Luzia - 2 Rua José de Brito Panela
title_short: (8800-562) Santa Luzia - 2 Rua José de Brito Panela
description: Line parking under some trees. Very close to the dirt parking lot, but that one is usually always full. We spent the night 4 motorhome as well and without any problem. There are containers to deposit garbage quite close and the boat that brings you to the beach . the way is 3 minutes walking.

title: (8135-107) - 428 Estrada da Horta
description: Schöner sauberer Parkplatz in Strandnähe. Haben hier geschlafen und in den Zahlreichen Restaurants und Bars was gegessen/getrunken. Haben hier auch eine ruhige Nacht verbracht. Steht nirgends ein Verbotsschild und wir haben für die Nacht 4€ bezahlt.

title: (8800-552) Santa Luzia - 56 Rua Joaquim Soares
description: Convenient off road parking, day parking only

title: () Santa Luzia - 56 Rua Joaquim Soares
description: Parking at the entrance of the village. Beautiful seaside with a view of a small moored fishing boat. No services. Excellent restaurants. Residents are discouraged.

title: (8800) União das freguesias de Tavira - 961Z N397
title_short: (8800) União das freguesias de Tavira - 961Z N397
description: Flat place in a river bend. Above is a small restaurant. There is delicious local food. There is no menu, but the prices are reasonable.

title: (8800-657) Tavira - 55 Rua dos Mouros
description: DigiGas - refill gas bottle station

title: (8800) Tavira - 100Z Rua João Vaz Corte Real
title_short: (8800) Tavira - 100Z Rua João Vaz Corte Real
description: We spent the night without any problem, we just had a little noise in the morning because there is a train which passes not far and people who work super early, at 5am! personally I did not hear anything but my husband did.

title: (8800) Portela - N397
description: Pull over on the side of the road, tap, bin, beautiful view!

title: (8800-351) Tavira - 59 Rua João Vaz Corte Real
title_short: (8800-351) Tavira - 59 Rua João Vaz Corte Real
description: Perfect for parking and seeing Tavira. Free parking shared with cars.

title: (8800-407) Tavira - 14 Rua George Rosado
description: Parking where you can park and even spend the night quiet (in December). No service. Next to the city center. Suitable for small motorhomes and vans.

title: (8800) Tavira -
description: Quiet place in the mountains with amazing 360 degree view

title: (8800) Santa Luzia - 38 Avenida Engenheiro Duarte Pacheco
title_short: (8800) Santa Luzia - 38 Avenida Engenheiro Duarte Pacheco
description: Clean public toilets

title: (8800-011) Cachopo - N124
description: A nice quiet place very close to the road, but there is not much traffic here, we did not stay at night but I think it is not a problem.

title: (8800) Tavira -
description: Small clearing on the right of a dirt road where there are other spots reported shortly before. We found it since the other spots were already taken, very quiet and clean, with 360 degree and starry views guaranteed in good weather. Keep this area clean!

title: (8100) Loulé -
description: There is drinking water free of charge and it doesn't take long to fill up as there is a lot of pressure.

title: (8100-294) Vale Judeu - 436A, EN125
description:
18+ ADULTS ONLY, small boutique Motorhome and Caravan family-run site. BOOKINGS AVAILABLE - MUST PHONE PRIOR TO ARRIVAL.
We are 5km from Vilamoura Marina and the Golf Courses in Vilamoura. Bus stops 200-400m walk:  Albufeira & Loule & Faro. Dogs & Cats welcomed. 'Orange' Stand next door, with Kebab 400m. Lidl & Aldi 4.4km drive in Bouliquime. Australian & Sth African 
Owners. 
** SERVICES ONLY AVAILABLE WITH OVERNIGHT STAY**

title: (8100) Boliqueime -
description: GALP station with LPG gas service

title: (8800-531) Santa Luzia - Praia do Barril
description: On the island of Tavira Toilets Showers at 1 euro Restaurant and beach nearby The place is forbidden to dogs and accessible by a paved path of 1km. There is also a little train. Open in December so I think all year!

name: Rustic Vintage Camping
title: (8100) Rustic Vintage Camping
description:
Rustic Vintage Camping Algarve

Family and friendly campsite, retro vintage, very nice, bar available. Everything you need to have a good time, secure camping. Vilamoura 2km, Quarteira 5km, Albufeira 10km, Aquashow 5 minutes, Supermarkets 2km, bus stop 400mt.

title: (8800-422) Tavira - 49 Rua do Poeta Isidoro Pires
title_short: (8800-422) Tavira - 49 Rua do Poeta Isidoro Pires
description: In the street free parking, near downtown

title: (8800-412) Tavira - 1 Praceta Florbela Espanca
description: Battery parking in quiet area and payment, but it is that the city is very bad to park motorhome, I have gone to 3 parking that put the application and there was no place or it is not too small to park. Here at least I park and I see the city

title: (8100) Alte -
description:
On top of the hill with awesome view. Next to the ruin there is space for one vehicle. Flat spot. I made it up with a 2WD Sprinter. 
No trash when I’m here, keep it like that.

title: (8125-406) Quarteira - 301Z Rua da Pernada
description: Calm place with good shadows, hypermarket, fuel pumps, restaurants, pastry shops.

title: (8800) Cachopo - 5 N124
description: Fresh water from the well

title: (8125) Quarteira - R. do Poço Romano
description: Asphalt parking next to the walkways of the beach promenade. Sea views, bright and very quiet in winter
